Resources Page

A simple grid of mental health issues with links to information

Trusted Mental Health Resources

NHS Mental Health

Official UK guidance and support for mental health and wellbeing.

Visit NHS

Mind

Mental health charity offering advice and support across the UK.

Visit Mind

Samaritans

24/7 support for anyone in emotional distress or crisis.

Visit Samaritans

Addiction Support

Free, confidential help for drug, alcohol, and behavioural addictions.

Visit With You

Self-Harm Support

Specialist support for self-injury, especially for women and girls.

Visit SIS

PTSD Support

Resources and guidance for living with post-traumatic stress disorder.

Visit PTSD UK

Grief & Loss Support

Cruse offers compassionate support for anyone grieving the loss of a loved one.

Visit Cruse

LGBTQ+ Support

MindOut is a mental health charity run by and for LGBTQ+ people.

Visit MindOut

Eating Disorder Support

Beat provides guidance and helplines for those affected by anorexia and other eating disorders.

Visit Beat
